name: FuriousAngels CMS
short_description:
New version of Furious-Angels.Com CMS system to replace vbulletin in a more hopefully usefriendly Q&A style format with user self moderation systems.

This project is in early development you can attempt to use it at will but no promises it'll work at any particular point in time.
summary: New Q&A style CMS for FA
